holidays.title: National Biodiesel Day
holidays.description: We’re more reliant on biodiesel fuel than we realize!

holidays.title: Forgive Mom and Dad Day
holidays.description: Accept and cherish your parents’ imperfections in the same way that they do yours!

holidays.title: Global Recycling Day
holidays.description: Upcycle your trash and see how recycling can affect our planet and your pocket!

holidays.title: Goddess Of Fertility Day
holidays.description: The day focuses on the concept of creating life in humans and other beings.

holidays.title: National 3-D Day
holidays.description: If you enjoy 3.D. movies, art, or technology, today’s the day to celebrate 3.D.

holidays.title: National Ag Day
holidays.description: Everything we eat, use, or wear every day is provided by agriculture.

holidays.title: National Anthem and Flag Day in Aruba
holidays.description: Sunny smiles beckon as we sing ‘One Happy Island’ to celebrate this joyous occasion.

holidays.title: National Lacy Oatmeal Cookie Day
holidays.description: Tasty, crisp, and chewy, these are the addictive qualities of the Lacy Oatmeal cookie.

holidays.title: National Sloppy Joe Day
holidays.description: It's about to get sloppy! Get your napkins ready as we enjoy a sloppy Joe today.

holidays.title: National Supreme Sacrifice Day
holidays.description: A minute of silence for those who gave their lives to protect and save others.

holidays.title: Tea for Two Tuesday
holidays.description: There’s no better way to enjoy someone’s company than over a cup of tea.

holidays.title: Transit Driver Appreciation Day
holidays.description: Appreciate your transit driver today for making your daily travels easy and problem-free.

holidays.title: World Social Work Day
holidays.description: Get more people inspired to do good and observe World Social Work Day.

holidays.title: Adam Levine’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this uber-talented and awesome singer, Adam Levine's journey is only just beginning.
